relations.head: METTL3
relations.label: methylate
relations.text: Previous studies have indicated that METTL3-mediated N6-methyladenosine (m6A) modification is closely associated with PC progression and prognosis.

relations.head: m6A
relations.label: is on
relations.text: Four m6A motifs were identified in Linc00662, which maintained the stability of Linc00662 in an IGF2BP3-coupled manner and were closely associated with the pro-tumor properties of Linc00662 in vitro and in vivo

relations.head: IGF2BP3
relations.label: bind
relations.text: Four m6A motifs were identified in Linc00662, which maintained the stability of Linc00662 in an IGF2BP3-coupled manner and were closely associated with the pro-tumor properties of Linc00662 in vitro and in vivo

relations.head: Linc00662
relations.label: recruit
relations.text: ITGA1 was identified as a downstream gene regulated by Linc00662. Linc00662 recruites GTF2B to activate the transcription of ITGA1 in a m6A-dependent manner and initiates the formation of focal adhesions through the ITGA1-FAK-Erk pathway

relations.head: ITGA1
relations.label: activate
relations.text: ITGA1 was identified as a downstream gene regulated by Linc00662. Linc00662 recruites GTF2B to activate the transcription of ITGA1 in a m6A-dependent manner and initiates the formation of focal adhesions through the ITGA1-FAK-Erk pathway

relations.head: FAK
relations.label: activate
relations.text: ITGA1 was identified as a downstream gene regulated by Linc00662. Linc00662 recruites GTF2B to activate the transcription of ITGA1 in a m6A-dependent manner and initiates the formation of focal adhesions through the ITGA1-FAK-Erk pathway

relations.head: focal adhesion
relations.label: promote
relations.text: The FAK inhibitor-Y15 obviously repressed tumor progression in Linc00662-overexpressing PC cells in vitro and in vivo

relations.head: Linc00662
relations.label: promote
relations.text: Linc00662 was screened as a m6A-enriched RNA that promoted tumor growth and metastasis in PC cells and mouse models and was associated with poor clinical prognosis

relations.head: Linc00662
relations.label: promote
relations.text: Linc00662 was screened as a m6A-enriched RNA that promoted tumor growth and metastasis in PC cells and mouse models and was associated with poor clinical prognosis

relations.head: prostate cancer
relations.label: upregulate
relations.text: In this study, we found that METTL3 was upregulated in PC tissues and cells and was associated with malignant tumor progression and poor progression-free survival in PC

relations.head: METTL3
relations.label: affect
relations.text: In this study, we found that METTL3 was upregulated in PC tissues and cells and was associated with malignant tumor progression and poor progression-free survival in PC

relations.head: METTL3
relations.label: affect
relations.text: In this study, we found that METTL3 was upregulated in PC tissues and cells and was associated with malignant tumor progression and poor progression-free survival in PC

Regulatory Relationships (text form):  
1. METTL3 methylates m6A, increasing Linc00662.  
2. m6A is on Linc00662.  
3. IGF2BP3 binds m6A, increasing Linc00662 stability.  
4. Linc00662 recruits GTF2B, activating ITGA1 transcription.  
5. ITGA1 activates FAK.  
6. FAK activates Erk.  
7. Erk initiates focal adhesion formation.  
8. focal adhesion promotes tumor growth.  
9. focal adhesion promotes metastasis.  
10. Linc00662 promotes tumor growth.  
11. Linc00662 promotes metastasis.
